CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Speculative"), "1 - Research", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Potential"), "1 - Research", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Capability Statement"), "2 - Marketing", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "EOI"), "2 - Marketing", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Budget Advice"), "2 - Marketing", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Confirmed"), "3 - Tendering", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Tender"), "3 - Tendering", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Post Tender"), "3 - Tendering", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cost Plan"), "3 - Tendering", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "ECI Stage"), "4 - Conversion", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation"), "4 - Conversion", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Preferred"), "4 - Conversion", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Under Construction"), "5 - Construction", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Complete"), "6 - Complete", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), "6 - Complete", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Withdrawn"), "6 - Complete", " " ))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Stage Category
